sentences.sentence: One way to lower costs will be to forge alliances with foreign companies or to expand internationally through appropriate takeovers – in short, to "globalize."
sentences.translation: 降低成本的途径之一将是与外国公司结成联盟或通过适当的兼并进行国际性扩张–简言之，就是“全球化”。

sentences.sentence: It is difficult for service organizations to globalize.
sentences.translation: 服务性组织全球化的难度很大。

sentences.sentence: Globalize products by reusing components and examples.
sentences.translation: 通过重新使用组件和样例使产品全球化。
